StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: UPDATESUBJECT
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.UPDATESUBJECT(pIDSubject IN NUMBER, pSubjectName IN VARCHAR2,&lt;br/&gt;pCredit IN NUMBER, pSubjectPrerequisites IN VARCHAR2, pIDPerson IN NUMBER) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN &lt;br/&gt; UPDATE Subject_table subj&lt;br/&gt; SET subj.subjectName = pSubjectName,&lt;br/&gt; subj.credit = pCredit,&lt;br/&gt; subj.subjectPrerequisites = pSubjectPrerequisites,&lt;br/&gt; subj.idPerson = pIDPerson&lt;br/&gt; WHERE subj.idSubject = pIDSubject;&lt;br/&gt;END updateSubject;
